website_summaries.verdict: Award-winning, expansive, open world western-themed adventure. Incredibly detailed and beautifully realized.
pros: Regarded as one of the greatest games ever made, this massive western world allows players to roam freely and interact with characters and the environment in both a main story and side quests
cons: The game is huge and long, may be too overwhelming or too much of an investment
Popularity has kept the price high for some time

customer_reviews.title: I don’t care. I am a cowboy
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more (Kio, Kio) I got the horses in the back Horse tack is attached Hat is matte black Got the boots that's black to match Ridin' on a horse, ha You can whip your Porsche I been in the valley You ain't been up off that porch, now Can't nobody tell me nothin' You can't tell me nothin' Can't nobody tell me nothin' You can't tell me nothin'
customer_reviews.author: romain

customer_reviews.title: Code Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: So I spend like almost $50 for this as a birthday gift for my brother. Normally, I don't like writing bad reviews, but this time I'm just annoyed that I order this game and the code inside didn't work. I asked for a replacement and that one didn't work. I just don't like how I bought this "new" game, and it's code doesn't work. Like why? They have been reasonably for sending a replacement, so I'll give a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game 👍
customer_reviews.text: So 1st off I'll say, this is absolutely my favorite game ! The issue I had was amazon sent me a European region disc so when I tried to buy anything in the game through the PlayStation store it would not reflect in my online game. And this is due to the different regions. My PlayStation account is in north America and as I said the game they sent was a European region disc. It took a while and a few phone calls to figure this out. So if your having the same issue this may be the reason. Amazon did return the game for me and is looking Into this, so hopefully it doesn't happen to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Steven V.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.  I am loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and have had only a few hours of play time but so far I am really getting into the game. No major bugs or issues so far and the graphics and game play are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: RobbygTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. It's so much fun and keeps you busy. It's a huge game full of adventure. Definitely one you want in your collection. Update. Still love the game but seems it is not a us version and I can't purchase add ons not does the code work. Look for us version of game.
customer_reviews.author: lynn m

customer_reviews.title: timing
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for my sons birthday for july 13th wasn't supposed to be delivered til the 17th and came on the 15th!!!!!! I am so pleased with the shipping timing he loves his game and didn't sleep at all the 1st night!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PORSCHA

customer_reviews.title: AMERICAN BUYERS BEWARE!!! THIS IS THE EUROPEAN VERSION AND YOU CAN'T DOWNLOAD DLC
customer_reviews.text: This is the European version of Red Dead Redemption with a PEGI rating. Don't assume it will be fine. Try downloading DLC. It won't work because you're in the the wrong region. This product is falsely advertised. It needs to be labeled European version. Now I'm stuck with it and another game that both have PEGI ratings and I won't be able to download DLC for them. What a rip off. Thanks Amazon. You suck.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Where is the Panther?
customer_reviews.text: Had to give game just three stars. I need only one animal for the very last pelt to be crafted. Can't get pelt because the Panther will not spawn for me. I've spent hours which is ridiculous, trying to find this animal. Yes. I'm in the right spots and hunt from dusk to morning. They just came out will a patch that didnt address issue. Had no problems finding cougars which were running around chasing the locals. Very dissapointed as you can't talk to any live person for tech support.
customer_reviews.author: br3400

customer_reviews.title: More garbage from rockstar
customer_reviews.text: Like rockstar games itself this game is a good idea, but poor execution. It’s glitchy, mundane and boring. If you like cooking doing chores and point to point traveling this is your game. Too many people give rockstar a pass for their inferior products. Probably because ALL video games are so bad. What’s next for rockstar? How about a game about weaponized vacuuming? Maybe if they spent less time pushing political agendas and more time doing their jobs they could make a better game.
customer_reviews.author: BiggadigityDee

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Classic
customer_reviews.text: Will keep this simple, this is one of the best video games ever created, and personally one of my top 3 favorite games ever. The story line is incredible and well written, the characters are memorable, and the game play is fantastic, with plenty of things to do. Despite the bugs while playing online, it is not enough to take off one star. Many people including me play it to this day, as they are still releasing updates.
customer_reviews.author: Xav

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: Rockstar hit it out of the park with this one. Highly immersive game from beginning to end. Great story, relatable characters, and tons of side content to do that manages to feel important instead of just busywork. It's so easy to just get lost in the world, getting sidetracked from whatever you were doing because some other interesting thing popped up. I played it for probably over 100 hours, and played every day for a solid month. Have not played the online mode, so I can't comment on that; however, I would highly recommend it for the single player alone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Donahue

customer_reviews.title: RDR at its finest.
customer_reviews.text: GTA in the west. They're weren't so many people back in the old days, so it matches with that world of emptiness (while GTA V supposed to be crowded and it isn't. I like realism). I'm somewhat stuck playing dominoes and poker with the AI and sometimes go hunting, enjoying the scenery. It's as good as the first game.
customer_reviews.author: John Lesnar

customer_reviews.title: Engaging
customer_reviews.text: While parts of the game seem slow (riding forever for destinations), it is an engaging game. The game takes a lot of time and is very open. Being retired, I play games to pass the time and this one fits the bill. Controls seems a little clunky but, other than that, it is a well done and visually stimulating game.
customer_reviews.author: TomG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GAME
customer_reviews.text: I don't play playstation games often, but I love horses and the old west and this is such a great game! I love the missions, the characters and especially the horses and graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Red Dead Redemption 2. Everything about it is amazing; the graphics, the story, the characters, the dialogue, the missions, the soundtrack, everything! I’ve played the complete story 4 times over and never got bored or sick of it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: PS 4 USERS BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: PS 4 PRO USERS BEWARE! 4k and HDR modes are irritatingly blurry. Apparently this has been an issue since 2018. Look it up online before you buy. If you do buy turn off the HDR mode. That helps a tad. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AmZone

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line story mode
customer_reviews.text: This game has one of the best solo campaign storyline to date. I couldn’t help but to get attached to Arthur as he dual wielding pistols while on horseback through a huge map. It felt like a movie the way the story climaxed. Def worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Sarabia

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: The PS4 would not read it as a PlayStation game. Bought it early as a Christmas gift and now it is too late to get a refund. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Yankees Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Detailed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he reported that it is very detailed and involved. He has enjoyed it but says it will take a while to learn the intricacies of the game. We were pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: A very long game
customer_reviews.text: I like this game a lot. I spend many hours completing side missions and hunting animals. You can also go fishing but the big ones are hard to catch. The story is great and I wish there will be a sequel.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Immersive
customer_reviews.text: It is a huge old west world and I am just getting started. It combines about 100 different western films. The protagonist and his horse require maintenance, perhaps overly so. Nonetheless, a good buy. The seller was efficient and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOLD ME THE UK VERSION!!! that is a problem!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON. I purchased the game through Amazon and when I recieved it, it was the UK version. I don't live in EUROPE I live in AMERICA!!! If you buy it you will be region locked and won't be able to make purchases for it through the PS store. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect region means no DLC
customer_reviews.text: I specifically asked for a US version, but they sent me an EU version anyway. The DLC doesn’t work if you have the wrong region disk.

customer_reviews.text: I bought used,was in great condition besides a couple fingerprints that was able to get off for most part. I've been able to download and install fine, game runs good i have only had time to lay 1st mission so far. but overall happy with my purchase, would buy from again

customer_reviews.title: Rockstart junk
customer_reviews.text: Boring, goofy mechanics...don't believe the hype. This game is not good.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Duh
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest most intricate open world games of all time.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. Good game, arrived on time, no scratches. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: I guess it’s fun.
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend will not stop playing this cowboy game. He loves it possibly more than he loves me.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great game with a ton of side quests, long story and a huge open world. Worth the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. No issue with delivery and/or gameplay.

customer_reviews.text: Irritating game. Not that pleased with it. I’m just going in circles. Bored already.

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. Said it started out slow but he did enjoy pkaying

customer_reviews.text: Works great! I live in the USA and it works.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Gave this game to my son for Christmas and he loves it. Excellent storyline to go with fantastic graphics. Now if I can just get him to read as long as he plays this game!

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever

product_meta.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 (PS4)
product_meta.description: America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun as lawmen hunt down the last remaining outlaw gangs. Those who will not surrender or succumb are killed. After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must make a choice between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him. From the creators of Grand Theft Auto V and Red Dead Redemption, Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age. Pre-Order Red Dead Redemption 2 to get the War Horse and Outlaw Survival Kit: This handsome iron-grey-coloured Ardennes War Horse can always be relied on in the heat of the battle. With greater courage and stamina than the average steed, this is a horse that knows how to keep its head under fire. The War Horse is available in Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode. The Outlaw Survival Kit contains a collection of key supplies for enduring the rigours of life on the frontier, including items to replenish Health, Dead Eye and more. The Outlaw Survival Kit is available in Red Dead Redemption 2 Story Mode.
feature_bullets: From the creators of Grand Theft Auto V and Red Dead Redemption
An epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age
